description: The Gonzo Series features our favorite camp collar silhouette, giving you room to breathe and relax no matter the situation. Call it a party shirt, we call it an everyday shirt. The Gonzo Tiare is an ode to the potently fragrant, delicate, and plentiful tiare Tahiti blossoms. Constructed from 100% Organic Cotton.
name: Roark Gonzo Tiare Woven SS - Mens
